author: g...6
content_pl:
Instalacja atwa. Oprogramowanie HP Smart bezproblemowe. Zwrot 100zl Cashback z Promocji po kilku dniach od zakupu. Skanuje. Drukuje. 
Przez pierwsze 2-3 dni wszystko w porzdku, wydruki czarne i kolorowe bardzo dobre. Po 3 dniu, zupenie nagle, drukarka zaczyna drukowa biae poziome kreski na wydrukach kolorowych. W czarnym bardzo dobrze. Wydruki w najlepszej jakoci s bardzo dobre. Wydruki w jakoci normalnej i roboczej s moim zdaniem wadliwe. Kupiem 2 drukarki. Jedn udao mi si zwr贸ci w ramach 14 zwrotu. Druga niestety zostaa. 
Producent HP raz uzna gwarancj. HP przysai now gowic kolorow, a jak problem nie zosta rozwizany, ca now drukark. Trzecia drukarka tak samo, drukuje biae kreski na wydrukach kolorowych. 
Zgoszone ponownie do HP, tym razem w ocenie wsparcia HP, drukarki atramentowe tak drukuj... Pozostawi to bez komentarza. Chciaem zgosi w ramach rkojmi, niezgodno produktu z umow (reklamuj outstanding printing quality), ale niestety kupiem na firm i rkojmia jest wyczona. Nie wiem czy wadliwa seria drukarek, gowic, oprogramowania czy mo偶e ja co 藕le robi przy 1-szym uruchamianiu, ale HP nie chce pozna i rozwiza problemu. Dobre jest to, 偶e po kilku dniach, pierwsze strony wydruk贸w wychodz ok, a kreski pojawiaj si dopiero na 3-4 stronie. Mo偶e z czasem si to poprawi samo, jeli problemem jest zapowietrzenie gowicy lub aktualizacja oprogramowania sprztowego... 
Co ciekawe, HP nie wymaga odcigania tuszy strzykawk do wysyki drukarki a sklep tak. Drugi raz bym nie kupi, chyba 偶e sprawdzon przetestowan.
content_en:
Easy installation. HP Smart software trouble -free. Return of PLN 100 Cashback from the promotion a few days after purchase. Scans. Prints. 
For the first 2-3 days everything is fine, black and colorful prints very good. After the 3rd day, quite suddenly, the printer begins to print white horizontal lines on colored prints. Very good in Czarny. Printouts in the best quality are very good. Prints in normal and working quality are in my opinion defective. I bought 2 printers. I managed to return one as part of the 14 return. The second unfortunately stayed. 
The HP manufacturer once recognized the warranty. HP has sent a new colored head, and as the problem was not solved, the whole new printer. The third printer is the same, prints white lines on colored prints. 
Reported to HP again, this time in the HP support assessment, inkjet printers print this way ... I will leave it without comment. I wanted to report as part of the warranty, the product's incompatibility with the contract (they advertise the Outstanding Printing Quality), but unfortunately I bought the company and the warranty is turned off. I do not know if a defective series of printers, heads, software or maybe I do something wrong with the 1st start, but HP does not want to know and solve the problem. It is good that after a few days, the first pages of the printout come out ok, and the lines appear only on the 3-4 page. Maybe over time it will improve by itself, if the problem is to announce the head or update the hardware software ... 
Interestingly, HP does not require pulling the carcass with a syringe for shipping the printer and the store yes. I wouldn't buy a second time, unless tested.

author: b...a
content_pl: Wykonana dobrze, troch za du偶a, z ledwoci mieci mi si na biurku, ale mo偶e by. Drukuje ciszej w por贸wnaniu z poprzedni drukark HP 209a. Napeniam tusze do pena i po ok.10 kartkach ubyo mi 4 mm czarnego tuszu w pojemniku. Mam nadziej, 偶e bdzie wydajna. Na razie nie mog tego stwierdzi. Fajnie, 偶e mo偶na zobaczy, ile ubyo tuszu. Dolewanie jest banalnie proste, tusz nie wylewa si. Martwi mnie tylko, 偶e przenosi trzeba j w pozycji poziomej, bo inaczej tusz mo偶e si wylewa. Og贸lnie jestem zadowolona z zakupu.
content_en: Made well, a bit too big, it barely fits on my desk, but it can be. Prints quieter compared to the previous HP 209A printer. I filled the inks to full and after about 10 cards I lost 4 mm black mascara in the container. I hope it will be efficient. I can't say it yet. It's nice that you can see how much mascara has lost. Putting is very easy, the mascara does not spill. I am only worried that you have to move it in a horizontal position, otherwise the ink may pour out. I am generally satisfied with the purchase.

content_en:
After 1 day of use
2-tank tank-attempt
3-Montaz ,, GLOWIC ,,-hopeless access, some orange crap is hard to get out of the printer's interior (damn such protection) but it went
4 -Pole with the phone -a problem
5-like from a computer yes and from the phone (through the HP Smart application) without problems
6-Drust on ordinary paper cool (black and color)
7 -work tests on photo paper -we will see
8 -generalized -I recommend such money for such money

A little intuitive application, not as annoying as it used to be but the configuration lasted too long. And besides, completely cool.

author: Madziana
content_pl: Drukarka od samego pocztku jest bardzo przyjazna, pierwsze uruchomienie pomimo 偶e na pocztku wyglda na do skomplikowane po obejrzeniu szczeg贸owej instrukcji jest banalnie proste :) Konfiguracje i podczenie do sieci wi fi trwao bardzo kr贸tko i bya wyjtkowo  atwe :) Drukarka zostaa skonfigurowana zostaa na komputerze oraz smartfonie z androidem, zar贸wno na komputerze jak i na smarthonie aplikacja do sterowania drukarki jest bardzo przejrzysta i intuicyjna. Na pochwa zasuguje  aplikacja dla androida kt贸ra jest konfigurowalna  i mo偶na przystosowa j dla swoich potrzeb, jeli chodzi o wydruk to mo偶na przyzna 偶e, drukarka drukuje cicho, bardzo szybko a jako wydruku zar贸wno w kolorze czarnym jak i w kolorze jest rewelacyjna :) kolory 偶ywe, wyraziste, obrazki nierozmazane. Mog oficjalnie przyzna 偶e spenia moje oczekiwania w wydruku jak i w wygldzie :)
content_en: The printer from the very beginning is very friendly, the first start, despite the fact that at the beginning it looks quite complicated after seeing the detailed instructions is very easy :) Configurations and connection to the Wi Fi network took a very short and was extremely easy :) The printer was configured on the computer and Android smartphone, both on the computer and on the smarthon transparent and intuitive. The application for Android deserves praise which is configurable and can be adapted for your needs when it comes to printout, you can admit that the printer prints quietly, very quickly and the quality of the print in both black and color is sensational :) Vibrant colors, expressive, images not fried. I can officially admit that it has met my expectations in the print as well as in appearance :)

At this price you should also expect a double -sided automatic print. Although the info of a double -sided printout is on the store's website, but in fact it has nothing to do with a double -sided printout, the card must be transferred manually according to the displayed instructions.

author: psh3m
content_pl:
HP Smart Tank 515 drukarka, kt贸ra ma wszystko to, co chciaby mie.
Proste uruchomienie i atwa konfiguracja - prosz bardzo, zrobione.
Czyste donie przy wymianie tuszu, oraz jego dziecinnie proste uzupenianie - jednak to mo偶liwe.
Masz ze wspomnienia cigle szukajc miejsca na drukark w pobli偶u komputera ? - to ju偶 mo偶esz mie tylko ze wspomnienia, bo szybka konfiguracja i drukujesz zdalnie po sieci, bez wzgldu na to gdzie jeste ze swoim komputerem, tabletem, telefonem.
Chcesz mie byskawicznie swoje ulubione foto w ramce na cianie ? - jakie to proste, wylij zdjcie prosto z telefonu do drukarki i w贸偶 w ramk.
Czy ja chciaem kiedy co wicej od drukarki ?
Czy jeszcze miaem w tym temacie jakie 偶yczenia ?
Naciskam "Drukuj", otrzymuj super dobry wydruk w kolorze i... zapominam, 偶e mam drukark :)  
Czytaj mniej
content_en:
HP Smart Tank 515 Printer who has everything you would like to have.
Simple launch and easy configuration - please, done.
Clean hands when replacing the mascara, and his childishly simple complementing - but it is possible.
Do you have bad memories still looking for a place for a printer near a computer? - You can only have bad memories, because a quick configuration and you print remotely on the web, no matter where you are with your computer, tablet, phone.
Do you want to have your favorite photo in a frame on the wall? - How simple it is, send a photo straight from the phone to the printer and put in the frame.
Have I ever wanted something more than a printer?
Did I still have any wishes in this topic?
I press "Print", I get a super good printout and ... I forget that I have a printer :)  
Read less

Posiadam ju偶 drukark "brata" ze redniej p贸ki ale w jakoci wydruku jak i szybkoci ustpuje drukarce HP Smart Tank 515. Dodatkowo du偶ym, naprawd du偶ym plusem jest system uzupeniania tuszu. Nie do, 偶e uzupenia si stae pojemniczki to jeszcze zakup ich jest bardzo ekonomiczny. Szybko zwr贸ci si zakup. Producent do drukarki przewidzia bardzo fajn i przejrzyst aplikacj na smartfony. content_en: I have had a printer for several days. From the very beginning, she was subjected to intensive and hard work. Printing both documents and photos is fast. I already have a "brother" printer from the middle shelf but in the quality of print and speed it gives way to the HP Smart Tank 515 printer. In addition, a large, really big plus is the ink complement system. It is not enough that fixed containers are completed, the purchase of them is very economical. The purchase will quickly return. The printer manufacturer has anticipated a very nice and transparent smartphone application. If someone is looking for a good printer with cheap operation, I recommend buying a smart tank 515

Simple, very intuitive design of the printer is therefore very easy to use. A careful connection via Wi-Fi and a USB cable. Print colors are very good. The printer made a good impression on me, I hope it will accompany me over the next years of study. It is really decent equipment.

I strongly advise against the printer without printing through the cable!

content_pl: Po okoo miesicu od zakupu i drugim uruchomieniu skanera , ten偶e skaner odm贸wi posuszestwa. Niby poprzez aplikacj do naprawiania bd贸w udaje si skanowa testowo , ale ju偶 z poziomu aplikacji u偶ytkowej wyskakuje bd i nijak nie mo偶na go naprawi. 呕enujce. Ostatni zakup od firmy HP.
content_en: About a month after the purchase and the second launch of the scanner, the scanner refused to obey. Apparently, through the application for fixing errors, it is possible to scan test, but from the level of applied application a mistake pops up and you can not fix it. Embarrassing. Last purchase from HP.
